description:
KJR overhears B.B.B.`s dad telling his mom that he`s going to "quit" and "close up shop." He mistakenly thinks he means they`re shutting down the Bitery forever, and tells everyone in town what he heard. The townsfolk decide to try to help while pretending they don`t know, so they visit the Bitery in droves and offer them snacks and well-wishes. B.B.B. notices everyone is acting strange and tries to find out the truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウソでしょ!? さよならかじり屋
